newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Berjaya Leisure unit buys U.K. hotel.
newsitem.headline: Berjaya Leisure unit buys U.K. hotel.

text.p: Berjaya Vacation Club Bhd, the vacation timesharing arm of Berjaya Leisure Bhd, has acquired the 137-room Eden Park Hotel in London for 8.0 million pounds sterling

The national Bernama news agency said on Wednesday the deal, signed on November 16, was expected to be completed by mid-December. The hotel would be renamed Berjaya Eden Park Hotel, said Berjaya Hotels & Resorts (BHR), which would managed the hotel.
BHR, part of Berjaya Leisure, said the three-star hotel underwent extensive refurbishment in 1990.

Berjaya Vacation Club senior vice president Khor Poh Waa said the company was excited about the acquisition which would add to the already wide range of accommodation offered to the company's vacation timesharing members, Bernama reported.
